message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000 for it.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $12,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $13,500.  This product offers significant value, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your persistence in valuing the product. However, based on my budget constraints, I can only consider an offer around $12,500. I hope this might be within the range you're considering.
